job_purpose: Provide exceptional remote, telephone, and email support to clients, ensuring high-quality service and technical issue resolution.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Deliver exceptional customer service to ensure client satisfaction
Provide technical troubleshooting for a variety of IT issues
Communicate technical information in a user-friendly manner
Maintain a positive and proactive approach to tasks
Seek learning opportunities and demonstrate resilience
Make quick decisions and troubleshoot efficiently
Manage time effectively and prioritize tasks
Utilize experience with Active Directory, Exchange, Windows Server, and Microsoft 365
Hold relevant IT qualifications to support role
required_qualifications: 6-12 months of hands-on IT support experience
Experience in a Managed Service Provider environment
Relevant certifications such as Microsoft, ITIL, or CompTIA A+
Strong interpersonal skills and commitment to customer service
Ability to thrive in a collaborative team environment
Proficiency in Microsoft Office 365 and PSA ticketing systems
Commitment to meeting key performance indicators and service level agreements
MS-900 Fundamentals certification or willingness to obtain
company_details: KMTech is a leader in providing innovative technology solutions, committed to delivering outstanding service and fostering a collaborative and growth-oriented workplace. The company values curiosity, challenges, and high performance, offering a supportive work environment with wellness programs, professional development opportunities, and a hybrid working policy.
